mapper.select: SELECT `product`.`product_name_en` AS productName, `product`.`brand` AS brand, COUNT(`order`.`id`) AS transactionCount, `image`.`data` AS imageData, `image`.`type` AS imageType, (SELECT COALESCE(MIN(`seller_bid`.`price`), 0) FROM `kream`.`seller_bid` INNER JOIN `kream`.`size` ON `seller_bid`.`size_id` = `size`.`id` WHERE `size`.`product_id` = `product`.`id` AND `seller_bid`.`state` = 'BIDDING') AS lowestPrice FROM `kream`.`order` INNER JOIN `kream`.`buyer_bid` ON `buyer_bid_id` = `buyer_bid`.`id` INNER JOIN `kream`.`size` ON `size_id` = `size`.`id` INNER JOIN `kream`.`product` ON `product_id` = `product`.`id` INNER JOIN `kream`.`image` ON `product`.`id` = `image`.`product_id` AND `image`.`is_primary` = 1 WHERE `order`.`state` = 'DELIVERED' GROUP BY `product`.`id` ORDER BY transactionCount DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT `product`.`id` AS productId, `product`.`product_name_en` AS productName, `product`.`brand` AS brand, `image`.`data` AS imageData, `image`.`type` AS imageType, (SELECT COALESCE(MIN(`seller_bid`.`price`), 0) FROM `kream`.`seller_bid` INNER JOIN `kream`.`size` ON `seller_bid`.`size_id` = `size`.`id` WHERE `size`.`product_id` = `product`.`id` AND `seller_bid`.`state` = 'BIDDING') AS lowestPrice, (SELECT COUNT(`order`.`id`) FROM `kream`.`order` INNER JOIN `kream`.`buyer_bid` ON `order`.buyer_bid_id = buyer_bid.id INNER JOIN `kream`.`size` ON buyer_bid.size_id = size.id WHERE `order`.`state` = 'DELIVERED' AND `size`.`product_id` = `product`.`id`) AS transactionCount FROM `kream`.`product` INNER JOIN `kream`.`image` ON `product`.`id` = `image`.`product_id` AND `image`.`is_primary` = 1 INNER JOIN `kream`.`size` ON `product`.`id` = `size`.`product_id` WHERE `product`.`is_deleted` = 0 ORDER BY `product`.`created_at` DESC LIMIT 20
